title: Business Leaders Hope Shifts In Congress Will Bring Tax Reform
teaser: Many business groups see an opportunity in the outcome of the election and plan to revive an agenda that's been dormant for years. From energy and trade to taxes and regulation, there is a lot on the table, but no guarantee anything will be passed anytime soon.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
